reviews.review_text: This place is a gem and so are the hosts. Rehana, our server, was amazing, and her colleague (Im kicking myself for not getting his name) was just as great. The food was delicious - we had their specialty dish - Namak Mandi, and the atmosphere was cozy - the kind of place where you instantly feel at home. Cant wait to go back and enjoy another wonderful meal with such friendly and attentive staff.

Visiting from California looking for a great meal. Had a very lovely dinner at this amazing restaurant! From food to service everything was top notch. I wasnt expecting authentic Pakistani flavors but everything we ordered was perfect and took me straight back home! The Chicken Lahori Karahi was made to perfection with the right level of spice and curry sauce. Would like to thank our waiter Awais for recommending us and giving us a delightful evening with a great chat. Would definitely come here again if ever visiting Vancouver!

Came from Edmonton to have some awesome Pakistani food. Expectations were MORE than met! Service was unreal and they treated us like true guests . Would come here every weekend if we could! Thanks to the team: especially Rihaana.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Somayya Kiani thank you for your feedback we really appreciate your business you re very welcome when ever you visit Vancouver we would love to serve you guys thank you

reviews.review_text: As someone who has always been fascinated by the rich culture and diverse cuisines of the world, I was thrilled to discover Karakoram Restaurant in Vancouver. From the moment I walked in, I was greeted with warm hospitality and an inviting atmosphere that made me feel right at home. The decor is stylish and modern, with elegant lighting and comfortable seating. The menu features an impressive range of dishes from across the region, and the food is simply outstanding. Each dish is expertly crafted using only the freshest ingredients, and the flavours are vibrant and authentic. One of my favourite dishes is the Chicken Biryani, which is a fragrant and savoury rice dish that is seasoned with a blend of spices and herbs, and layered with succulent pieces of chicken. The lamb kebab is another must-try, with tender chunks of meat that are marinated in a delicious blend of spices and grilled to perfection. But what really sets Karakoram Restaurant apart is the exceptional service. The staff are friendly, attentive, and always willing to go above and beyond to ensure that their guests have a wonderful experience. From making recommendations to accommodating special requests, they truly go the extra mile. Whether youre a fan of Pakistani cuisine or simply looking for a unique and delicious dining experience, Karakoram Restaurant is an absolute must-visit. I cant recommend this place enough, and I look forward to my next visit!

The karahi is their signature dish and it s good! The people are very nice and helpful, ask for recommendations before you order (unlike what I did oops). I ll be back to try more flavors of karahi, and I ll bring friends.
The Karahi in Karakoram is another level. I also like  the haleem, it wasn t good before but now the recipe changed ig. I like the new taste better.

Delicious food, had the Karahi lamb, fresh naan, beef biryani (found out its half price on Wednesday) and lamb chops. Everything was spiced amazing, flavor was perfect, meat was halal and so tender. Service was good but they missed the fish pakora we ordered so never tried it. Had the Gulab Jamun w/ ice cream for dessert, and the falooda, both really good and decently unique
Had a spiritual experience with the chicken biryani. The karahi and kebab are excellent too. Highly recommend. I m no connoisseur but I feel confident in stating that this place is authentic.

We came in for a late lunch at about 3.45 pm and the restaurant was closed. But, the owner was kind enough to let us in and order whatever we d like from the menu. That s what customer service is. The owner gave us suggestions and made sure we were doing fine. The food is absolutely fantastic with delicate spices. The Special Karahi is stunning. I d like to thank the owner and staff for their amazing food and service, and also serving us while we came in early.

We drove from Seattle to Canada for dinner in Karakoram. It was an amazing experience, superb delicious food , great ambiance. Excellent customer service. Accommodated us despite big ongoing event in the restaurant. We recommend to try  mutton biryani , chicken seekh Kabab, beef Nihari, goat namak mandi karahi. Thank you to karakoram for complimentary dessert and Kashmiri tea. The Best restaurant in Vancouver/surrey. Must must try.

We are visiting Vancouver from Regina, Saskatchewan. We wanted to try pakistani restaurant and ended up at Karokoram Restaurant. I dont know any other pakistani restaurant in Vancouver but I can say surely that Karakoram has the real and authentic pakistani foods. we were not sure what to order so we asked their staff (Ayesha) for her suggestions for about 5 people. She recommended BBQ platter and every dish that included in the platter was so delicious and yummy, especially chicken karahi and chicken biryani. For dessert, we tried falooda and gajar ka halwa. Both were incredibly tasty. We would love to go again to try their foods. I highly recommend karakoram restaurant for those who are looking for real taste of pakistani foods. Parking: I believe street parking

Great food   we tried chicken karhai, biryani, nihari and haleem for main course and everything was authentic and delicious They have a very extensive menu and cordial service: desserts were very good too. Highly recommended !!
Lamb Lahori karahi with garlic naan is just out of the world!! We ordered their biggest platter and each of the items was super delicious    Highly recommend ..

The owner is a great guy! I visited this place with a friend and the owner personally dropped by our table to check in about our experience. We had a great conversation with him and he seemed to really know about the subtle nuances of what it takes to cook a really tasty meal. The Chicken Karahi here is by far the best I have ever had. We tried various kinds of breads with the Karahi and they all tasted amazing. I really recommend this place to anyone who s visiting Vancouver and is looking for a good desi meal!

Stopped by Karakoram for some lunch and wasn t disappointed! I drove out from Washington just for this authentic and delicious Pakistani food. With more than enough to choose from on the menu, I had a hard time to decide what to order! The Palak Paneer was delicious, I used the naan to wipe off every last bit out of the bowl. The Karahi was everything you could want and tasted so fresh. Nothing was too spicy and I left with a very satisfied and full stomach. Already planning the next trip just to come back for more delicious food.

Our time in the restaurant, yesterday evening, Oct 21st, was a real delight, a moment to memorable, thanks to delicious, warm, tasty food. However, what takes the gold medal for us was the service we received from the team of waitresses present. What a tremendous group of caring, attentive, entertaining and smiling workers! Special mention to Rehana, whose friendly and professional ways to interact with us represent a rare commodity!  Good job team!

As a customer of Karakoram heres a review for the restaurant staff&best waitress service, specifically mentioning Waitress  Manjot Kaur I had a fantastic dining experience at this restaurant, thanks in large part to the exceptional service provided by Waitress. their attentiveness, warm demeanor, and thorough knowledge of the menu truly enhanced our meal. Manjot went above and beyond to ensure we had a memorable evening. Her recommendations were spot-on, and she was always there when we needed anything. I cant thank her enough for making our visit so enjoyable. I highly recommend this restaurant and especially commend Waitress Manjot Kaur for her outstanding service. Thumbs up for the team Karakoram! Thanks,

We came from Calgary and reached here late night. Our experience was great! Food was amazing! Restaurant was nicely dimmedly lit with very calm and soothing atmosphere. Our server Manjot Parmar went above and beyond her duties to accomodate all our needs. We had an unusual request of getting a paper printed and Manjot didnt bat an eye and quickly fulfilled our request. Will 100% recommend to all of our friends and family. 5/5

My boyfriend and I went for dinner. We had the vegetable samosa, fish pakora and butter chicken with garlic naan and rice. The samosa was delicious. The sweet edge mixed well with the chutney. The fish pakora was fresh and crispy. The butter chicken was so creamy and was excellent with the naan. We liked that the naan was hot, not too thick and drenched in garlic. The server was really kind and prompt. We loved our experience here.

Amazing taste and phenomenal experience. Will visit them again next time in Vancouver. Staff is super helpful recommending what to eat and service is excellent. Don t forget to leave your jacket in the car else food smell will stay in it for a while.

Great first time Pakistan food experience! Everything was tasty and full of flavors. Love the meat plate, very juicy and tender. Will definitely visit again! Vegetarian options: A wide variety of vegetarian options from appetizers to main dishes.

We tried the food and it was delicious. Try out chicken karahi and nehari. And don t forget to order lamb biryani. The staff is very helpful and respectful. Rehana ma am, thanks for everything. Will come here again.
We had a great experience! Server, Manjot Parmar is great at what she does and goes above her duties to help the customers. Thank you for the amazing food and service! 5/5

After reading a few reviews on here we gave this restaurant a try on a weekday and this is what we Liked: Temperatur check, hand sanitizing and customer tracking at the door. Food was great, tasted amazing well prepped and defiantly authentic Pakistani style. Service was okay and I only say okay because it was pretty busy but only two waitresses were on shift. Floors need to be taken care of while leaving we noticed they were very slippery. Will still give them all 5 stars since the food was amazing.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi S D thank you for your detail feedback we are happy that you liked our food we have cleaning company i will pass your comment about floor to them and make sure it is up to the standard looking forward to serve you again Team K-2

reviews.review_text: The quality and taste of their Chicken and Mutton is authentic and different. I would highly recommend those who really want to taste the best chicken in town. Specially their Balti chicken, Handi Chicken and Biryani s. Delicious food, had the Karahi lamb, fresh naan, beef biryani and lamb chops. Everything was spiced amazing, flavor was perfect, meat was tender. Service was great fish pakora we ordered so never tried it. Had the Gulab Jamun with Mango fruit cocktail and the falooda, both really good and decently cool.

Everything was amazing! Halal all the way! Very comfortable ambiance and a reasonable choice of desi items on the menu. Excellent service by the staff, really hardworking and solution oriented. I wish the quantity of their platters could be wholesome, but the taste is definitely great! My go to desi food place is sorted finally.
Some of the best chai I have had. Amazing karahi dishes.. they are known for them so def get them.. fresh rasmalai as well !!! Truly amazing. One was lamb karahi one was chicken karahi

Ive been walking by this place for months and always saw it was full so I was curious to try it out. Went last night and the food was delicious! Super fresh and tasty. Staff was very welcoming and nice, highly recommend to anyone!
It was my first experience with pakistanais Food Everything good the service the stuff very delicious meal and also Halal , highly recommend

Tried a few dishes here like paneer and biryani but the most memorable dish is their Karahi chicken which I recently ordered and brought to a dinner party. Needless to say it was a HIT! Karahi chicken is my absolute favourite chicken dish and I could eat it daily and Karakoram makes the best version I ve had here in Vancouver.
The food is so good, proper authentic Pakistani food. Make sure you have a reservation otherwise the wait is quite long, especially on a weekend!

Delicious food, wonderful ambiance and good service! Id like to give special commendations to one server in particular! I believe her name is Jol shes a lovely filipino lady and was very helpful and welcoming while we were there, she definitely deserves a raise! Please extend my gratitude to her :)

Well, you must enjoy Pakistani food here. Best is Karahi dishes, Tikka, Kabab, Fresh Naan, Pakistani Tea, vegetables dishes and more delicious dishes. You can order medium and hot spicy food, good and quick service. All server are friendly, knowledgeable about dishes, happy to help and answer you. They use  #HALAL meats. Few free parking, wheelchair accessible, 60-plus seating for dinner, and  online food order & and delivery option. Vegetarian options: Best and delicious vegetable dishes, fresh Noon, Tea. Parking: Few free parking and lots of other parking about few minutes walk. Kid-friendliness: Yes Wheelchair accessibility: Yes
First time here and we loved it! The food speaks for itself. The servers and chef came to our table. Arpita and Kushnam were very nice.

Best desi restaurant in Surrey. We only go to Surrey from Seattle to eat here. I recommend the restaurant to many of my co-workers with the confidence that their trip from Seattle will be great after eating scrumptious food here.

Can t tell you how amazing this place is!! The food is fresh, so delicious! Open at great hours, but best of all they are the most friendly caring service. Highly recommend. My wife and I will always be back!

Coming all the way from Seattle, Karakoram is a great Pakistani dining experience. Food is excellent and on a level I personally have not had before. Service is even better and the vibes inside the restaurant are unlike any other. My family and I have been to Karakoram many times and every single time we come the food and the dining experience is top notch. Would highly recommend

Ratings Scale 0 - 10 Variety: 8 Service or Product: 9 Customer Service: 9 Environment: 7 Cleaning: 6 Washroom: 2 Cost: 5 This was hands down the best Pakistani food Ive had in metro Vancouver over the past 2 years! The chicken karahi was a killer and the K2 platter which was a mix of beef and lamb kababs, chicken tikka boti and lamb boti was excellent as well! Naan, which I usually find to be weak areas for many restaurants here, were fresh, good sized and tasted great! When it came to the food, nothing disappointed, except maybe the vegetable pakoras. When good in taste and quantity, they were extremely extremely oily, which according to my wife happens when you dont let the oil heat enough before cooking. As for customer service by Pruthvi and Shadab, it was great, even if the wait time for food was quite long (~30 mins). They likely need more staff on weekend nights when it gets a little more busy than usual. Some areas for improvement that can further boost customer experience are: cleanliness, especially in the bathrooms. They were dirty and stank. Thats not good. Secondly, the ambiance needs a bit of work. It was a little dark. When it comes to dining, I prefer bright environments. However the food was so good, I could not deduct any points for this and still rate the overall experience as 5 stars! P.S the food is a little on the expensive side. It cost us around $35/head... Would visit more often if it was more economical.

I Used to visit this restaurant with friends. They were good before, there chicken Karahi chicken and karahi paneer was good and even naan. But ordered this week for take out. But it was not good experience, I even called the store back to notify them about naan s. The naan s I got with the dish was like from market of grocery store. There were bit heavy like breaded naan,they we re not cooked in store but the staff told they always cooked naan at the restaurant. I do not this so anything was taking in consideration, I did not even got a call back. Anyways when I went with my friends before we always got nice crispy and fresh naan. It s not a bad restaurant to visit one time. But as per there price is concern and quantity, you will definitely get double the quantity of food in that same price from other different restaurant. That was huge difference. Like there menu for example karahi paneer they charge 33$ with 2 naans . If you to different restaurant you get same quantity of karahi paneer for 17 or 18$
Good place to dine, came with friends and their dishes are marvelous. Will come with my cousin, for sure she will love this place as I did.

One of the best restaurant in town if you wanna try genuine Pakistani continental food....so much varieties especially in karahi, and each one of those has its own amazing taste. Staff is really friendly. Its an amazing place to have a nice family dinner with your taste of choice.

I always heard of Karakoram as a good Karahi whenever asked my peers but never really tried it. Finally today I was able to go there for dinner, I ordered Tandoori chicken and chicken Karahi. Their Karahi is so delicious and probably the best Karahi I have ever had in Vancouver. Tandoori chicken was good too. I also ordered chai afterwards and chai has that Elaichi touch in it.

Karakoram to the rescue! I can t thank enough the staff who ll even after closing helped me with the food. I was late and hungry and specially the staff tonight, Manjyot and I forgot the name of the other lady, both being kind enough to help me place an order. I really appreciate them going out of the way.

The quality and taste of their Chicken and Mutton is authentic and different. I would highly recommend those who really want to taste the best chicken in town. Specially their Balti chicken, Handi Chicken and Biryani s. The species combination is lit

We are British Pakistani family visiting Vancouver. After searching on Google came across this restaurant. Really happy that we made the right choice. We ordered a full Tawa and a lamb karahi. Both were exceptional. Kids and ladies all enjoyed the food. Will definitely recommend everyone
We went twice in a row, the food was delicious ,friendly and helpful service. The  Namak Mandi Karahi was another level,the spices it just perfect. We also enjoyed the drinks Mango lassi and Floooda.

I had the pleasure of visiting Karakoram restaurant, and I could not be happier with my experience! The staff were incredibly friendly and welcoming. The food was cooked to perfection - every dish was full of flavor and truly delicious! I would highly recommend this place if youre looking for an enjoyable night out in town. Five stars from me

Food was freshly cooked, very tasty and every dish was unique. The naans were freshly and hot and very fluffy. The only thing missing was salad and raita not served with the food, otherwise staff was very receptive although restaurant was very busy. Will recommend Pakistani to have Pakistani taste here.
Environment was neat clean and peaceful Service was great pricing is also good enough * The girl on the reception was super nice

Khushman is awesome and the service is excellent. She is a great barista and she makes good lime soda . The food is delicious . The biryani and the grilled chicken Tikka is fabulous . The service is seamless and the food arrived at impeccable timing .
Im amazed by their customer service. They are so kind and catered all my requests. The food is delicious and Id definitely recommend their K2 platter and Chicken Biryani. Im a fan!!!

Ayesha is the best server and the reason come to this restaurant, excellent service. Sanjay is an exceptional cook and a valuable asset to Pakistani cuisine in Vancouver. I came with a new guest and haf Pindi Chicken and Dum Biryani. Taste is awesome .....hats off Sanjay bhai

Karakoram restaurant is a wonderful place that celebrates the art of cooking. With its mouthwatering Biryani, flavourful Nihari, yummy shakes, and expertly prepared mutton dishes, this restaurant has made a special place in my heart (and stomach!). If youre looking for an authentic and unforgettable dining experience, I wholeheartedly recommend a visit to Karakoram Restaurant. Your taste buds will thank you!

I was so impressed with the service and the food. The fries were so crispy, and they were very delicious just like the rice. The butter chicken, perfect spicy-ness! The wings; the dip was so delicious it was minty and spicy.  I recommend that you go and try out the new restaurant in the area.

Excellent Service and food with generous portions! We ordered a full Paneer Karachi for four. Flavourful and authentic! If you like chai, this restaurant has one of the best i ve had in the lower mainland.

I just tried Karakoram for the first time and I must say their chicken karahi is out of this world and Rehanna was an amazing server She was very attentive and sweet. Overall experience was great! Would recommend to anyone. Need their karahi recipe

I live in Victoria and there are no Pakistani restaurants here. I ve been craving Pakistani food for a while and the food at Karakoram satisfied all my cravings completely. We ordered Chicken Biryani, Koila Karahi, Shami Kabab, Mango Lassi and Rabri Falooda. We absolutely devoured everything. And to top it off, the service was brilliant. Highly recommend!! P.S. DEFINITELY TRY THEIR CHAI!!

It s my first experience at middle eastern restaurant, and I am loved with the hospitality and food quality. Our server RIHANA took great care of us with a warm smile, she s familiar with multiple languages, so impressed with that. Highly recommend!!

Food are so awesome and people are accommodating. Start from the host which so polite, kind, and smile so sweet and  server are all hardworking and active. Place is so clean and organize. We had a great experience, I highly recommend to everyone this restaurant and definitely come back.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Ananya thank you for your feedback we really appreciate your business looking forward to serve you soon thank you

reviews.review_text: I went with a group of friends when Karakoram had setup ifthar (buffet meal after sunset during Ramadan month) for guests at $38/head. We were going there for quick bite and so, did not fancy a full buffet. Yet, the management was considerate to seat us and accept a la carte orders. We ordered the Lahori and lamb kebab with naan. The flavors were fresh and meat was juicy and tender. The Lahori went really well with the naan. I would certainly come back to try other types of karahi dishes. Parking: Free street parking is available

I ve been to this place a few times. The food is really nice but the portion of Biryani is very less sometimes. The staff is rude sometimes but the two new hires are quite friendly. Their karahis are a must try! The place is open till 1:30 am so that s a perk!! U should visit there on Wednesdays because they have a special Wednesday biryani for only 12$

Mashallah today the chicken biryani was just on another level. I could firmly say that it was one of the best biryanis I have ever had. This is coming from someone who has had Biryani in Pakistan and India. Brother Qasim thank you for the preparation. Will continue to enjoy the tasty Biryani and Karahis!

The food and service was excellent. The servers are very friendly and accomodating. The beef bhuna is among the best that I have ever eaten. We had the fish pakora, chicken pakora, BBQ chicken, Beef bhuna, Koila chicken karahi. Lahori mutton karahi, butter and chilli naan. All tasted really good. The sweet lassi had a bit of a saltiness to it which was good however you can ask for splenda if you dont like the saltiness. The mango shake was good as well. We were a group of 7 and everyone loved the food/service. Food takes a bit longer to be served but they are packed with customers which makes sense. Overall I give this place 5 stars.

Excellent food and lovely service! Just walked in here spontaneously having never tried Pakistani food and it was incredible! We asked for recommendations and got the Karahi and a Grill Platter and both were 10/10. A bit on the pricy side for a family restaurant but you absolutely get what you pay for, it s quality.

One of the most authentic restaurants around. Would like to specially mention Awais who was I think in all black attire, serving us. A gem of a guy and he made our experience completely worth it. Will visit soon again.

First of all, the food was great. Seems like a family owned small restaurant . This isn t your  listen to live music while eating  kind of place but the food was 10/10. Do check it out if you are foodie like me. Visiting from Edmonton this restaurants food just blew my mind.

The food was really so yummy and tasty. We all love the food. We have ordered veal Biryani BBQ plater Chicken Malai Boti Chana Daal and authentic karahi chicken and Roti naan and lassi. Trust me we finished them all special licking the karahi and chutni bowls. Strongly recommend to everyone who visit to Vancouver Wish them all the success endeavours Ameen Parking: Nice location at the corner all side

I recently dined at Karakoram restaurant and had the pleasure of trying their Karahi dishes. I must say, the experience was quite impressive. If you re a fan of flavourful Karahi dishes and warm hospitality, this restaurant is definitely worth a visit.

I tried Chicken Karhai, K2 Mix Grill, Mutton Bhuna and Chicken Biryani. Out of all items that I ordered, Chicken Karhai and K2 Mix Grill was super delicious. Everything else was good too. Service was excellent and I got to meet the chef. Overall a wonderful dining experience. We finished off our dinner with the best chai in Vancouver.

Being inhabitants of Hunza, the Karakuram,  when searched for Pakistani food in Vancouver, Karakuram Restaurant caught our eyes instantly. Our family loved and enjoyed the food, service and atmosphere thoroughly. Will visit again and recommend other too.Good luck Qasim.

Travelled all the way from Saskatchewan to Vancouver and tried many different Arab and South Asian restaurants but couldn t find that unique and exotic Pakistani and Oriental touch in the food that I ve found at this restaurant. Felt at home as soon I entered and saw the Pakistani flag hung on the wall. Excellent customer service and the staff was was very kind, nice and welcoming. Would definitely recommend this restaurant to the people looking for real Pakistani food!

Really Amazing food and service.. Even though the restaurant was so busy , but the servers really did a great job. Specially the guy name Shudiptho has explained us each and every menu , what it contains and how does it will taste ,It was really helpful. I loved their Karahi  Everyone should try it . The biriyani was bit hard, but I liked the spiciness  I recommend this restaurant for karahi  The best one in city  Will visit again ..

We dined in yesterday, had a karahi and Mutton Biryani. The food was fine but I really enjoyed the service, especially the ambiance. Manager was super welcoming and sweet, really enjoyed the experience.

I went with my other two friends today. The food was excellent and so was the service from an exceptional staff member  Hasan  bhai. Such a great place to hang out to spend some quality time!! Especially if someone  desi craves for the traditional dishes outside home!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Ariful hasan thank you for your feedback looking forward to serve you in style Team k2

reviews.review_text: Yesterday went with my uncle and friend. Desi style lahori karahi reminded me of Pakistan. Such a tasty karahi and excellent customer service. The only concern is that there should be more servers in busy times. Definitely would recommend this restaurant.

Amazing food and amazing people. Rihana, one of the staff members spreads very positive vibes. She and one other lady over there enhanced our experience with their restaurant. Their chef, Mr.Sanjay is also a good man had nice talk with him. Shukriya!

Everything from the food  to dessert was delicious!There were alot of amazing options to choose from.The really good thing is that the food is halal. The place was really great, organized, and clean as well as the washrooms and everything. Everyone was so welcoming. Staff were really nice, accomodating, and cooperative. Kid-friendliness: The staff was really nice, they smiled and chatted with the kids all along. Even the chef gave each of the kids a lollipop. Kids felt really happy and loved the restaurant!
Food was delicious, fresh and authentic. Service was very efficient. The staff helped make tasty recommendations.

Love everything about this place, food is fresh,  tasty and well presented,  nice and clean restaurant, lovely atmosphere, very good location and best of all great customer service!! Highly recommend. Food

This is my 4th visit here and Ive finally decided to give a review. We came here for my brothers birthday and was amazed at the service we received. That alone deserved 5 stars. Everyone from the kitchen came out and sang happy birthday which I was shocked about. The food is amazing. I highly recommend the Lamb Karahi and Haleem dishes. Not many places you can truly find authentic Pakistani cuisine. Keep up the good work.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Alex thank you for your feedback and recommendations it was our pleasure to serve you looking forward to serve you in style Team K2

reviews.review_text: There karahi are the bomb. Reminds me of Pakistan. There bbq is pretty good too. Limited parking available. It is a bit on pricier side. They were super nice the restaurant was not opened yet but they still let us in and served us food. Thank you Vegetarian options: They have veggie dishes Parking: There is very limited parking at the rear side, you should increase your parking space
Really good food! We asked our server (a very helpful and friendly lady) what she would suggest and we loved it all. Highly recommend.

A nice place to have halal food. Food was really delicious. Although Its little bit expensive but it worths. Perfect place to go with family. I went twice back to back as I was travelling Vancouver. It was the best Halal restaurant to me in Vancouver. I think this is one of a very few halal restaurant that is open late night.
Very good service. Rihana and Arpita did a great job. The food was perfect, so many options even for vegetarians. Would recommend to everyone!!!
Had a wonderful time at this restaurant. The Namak Mandi Karahi was absolutely amazing, and I definitely recommend it. The waitresses were also very helpful and welcoming. 5/5

Oh my gosh! This place is my favorite. I dont go very often since its not that close to where I live, but I wish I could keep going back every time. The food tastes so rich, creamy and flavourful that it makes me so happy. Recently, I went with my dad and it was his first time trying the food there..he LOVED it!! He said that it tasted exactly like how it was back home. The waiting time was only around 15 minutes since we were there as soon as it opened. The customer service is friendly and the seating is comfy too. The only light criticism I would have would be that they charge even for a tiny side dish of lettuce, onions or other veggies; but its only around a dollar and other dishes are reasonably priced. I guess it might be because they are a small business right now & inflation is on the rise so I dont mind very much. Overall, I definitely recommend going to this restaurant, itll be worth it!
Excellent food and service. All karahis were served piping hot and were portioned well. Ayesha took great care of us and we cant wait to come back!
The food was Amazing. Kababs won our heart. Chicken Karahahi was very tasty and flavory. Servers were friendly. Loved the atmosphere. Will visit this place again for sure Food : 5/5

Ive been to this place a few times and I have very few complains. The staff is helpful, the location is beautiful and the food is delicious - not much else one can ask for. Side-note: Their Goat Biryani is the best Ive had in Vancouver! Their chef is a legend and Im surprised the place isnt packed.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Salman thank you for your feedback and recommendations looking forward to serve you in style next time thank you Team K2

reviews.review_text: All the food was delicious   highly recommended. The staff is very kind. We are definitely coming back

Karakoram has some of the best non-vegetarian curries in Vancouver, be it chicken or mutton. There is a good selection of curry types, each sufficiently different from the other to not feel similar(like a lot of other restaurants). Must try: 4 types of Karahi Chicken(1/2 serves 2 and full serves 4-5), Mutton Nihari, and Haleem(served Pakistani style, instead of Hyderabadi) Also serves glass bottle cokes for the proper South Asian feel!
The food and the service were excellent, especially the fish pakora very fresh and good portion.
Real high end taste of Pakistan/Indian Cuisine. Loved every dish we have ordered and service was great.
It was overall good experience. The staff was so good. One of the staff also gave us sweets because it was my birthday. They were really kind and helpful.

Simply among the best Indian food in Vancouver. Visit this little gem if you love authentic South Asian cuisine. Their chai is a must have. Special thanks to our fabulous hostess, Ayesha. I will surely go again!
Amazing staff - they were very welcoming and sweet! And the food was fantastic too! Highly recommend the pindi kabab karahi!! Food
Great food! The lamb Karahi  was worth the wait! Super friendly she name Ayesha was so helpful and kind! Highly recommend!
We have always enjoyed their food and experience! Love going here with my family! The falooda drink was out of the world! Thanks for the great experience always, you never disappoint me! :)

Always a great experience at Karakoram. Discovered this place a year ago and it s definitely on my top list of favourite restaurants. A awesome place to dine in! As busy as it looks the staff are always welcoming, friendly and insuring you are enjoying your meal. Food always comes hot from the oven, flavourful and tender. I have not been disappointed. Had my first delivery experience yesterday. I was skeptical on ordering directly from the website as I wasn t sure what the reply period would be... They were quick to respond, made it an easy process to order and food came quickly and just as hot as if ordered in the restaurant.  I would encourage more to order directly from the website as the delivery service was just as great as the in dining experience. My favourite dish the Full order of the chicken Kahari. Huge portions that last me days!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Lauren, Thank you so much! It s wonderful to hear such feedback, makes us want to even better our services. Really looking forward to serve you again! Team K2

reviews.review_text: Karakoram Restaurant in Vancouver is a hidden gem! Their Koyla karhai, Beef seekh kabobs, and Malai boti were simply outstanding. A must-visit for authentic Pakistani cuisine lovers!
